name: Burning Air Balloon
description:
NOTE: For the best results play the game using Google Chrome.

Instructions
  • Click and drag the mouse to guide the air balloon out of harms way.
  • Click the balloon to put out fires and repair holes from pesky birds.
  • Stay in the air, or else you'll plummet to your doom.

Aim to get the highest score for glory and honor. Tweet me with your highest mark!
